name: Acrobatics
description: Balance, tumble, maneuver in mid-air, and squeeze through tight spaces.

name: Arcana
description: Recall knowledge about arcane magic, magical traditions, and creatures.

name: Athletics
description: Climb, force open objects, grapple, shove, swim, and similar physical feats.

name: Crafting
description: Create and repair items, identify alchemical objects, and assess structural weaknesses.

name: Deception
description: Lie, feint in combat, impersonate, and disguise yourself.

name: Diplomacy
description: Influence others, make requests, gather information, and negotiate.

name: Intimidation
description: Threaten, coerce, and demoralize others through fear.

name: Medicine
description: Diagnose ailments, treat wounds, and provide long-term care.

name: Nature
description: Recall knowledge about natural creatures, weather, plants, and geography.

name: Occultism
description: Recall knowledge about occult traditions, mysteries, and esoteric creatures.

name: Performance
description: Entertain through music, dance, acting, storytelling, or other artistic displays.

name: Religion
description: Recall knowledge about divine traditions, deities, holy symbols, and undead.

name: Society
description: Recall knowledge about history, cultures, governments, and geography.

name: Survival
description: Track creatures, navigate wilderness, subsist in the wild, and sense weather changes.

name: Thievery
description: Palm objects, steal, disable devices, and pick locks.
